items.sentence: After polishing his shoes, Tom brushed his teeth and combed his hair.
Just because Tom said he didn\'t have a key doesn\'t mean it\'s true.
I think I\'ve found something that you might be interested in seeing.
I can\'t help but think that maybe someday you and I\'ll get married.
At this time, I\'m not sure whether I\'ll go to college or get a job.
